name: Crazed Hedge Maze
description:
Crazed Hedge Maze

You play as Bri, and you find yourself stuck in what the locals called “The Crazed Hedge Maze”.  They claim the maze causes people to lose their sanity and resort to violence. You simply aren’t convinced but soon you will be forced to confront the truth.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Fire Gun: SpaceBar

Aim Gun: Mouse

Credits: 

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/setback-tt-brk-font.html

Everything else: Me

My Other Games: https://jackbeterson.itch.io 

My Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT0RKF5vurxLNJUNij7aRFA
